member.name: T:Catel.Core.ModuleInitializer
member.summary: Class that gets called as soon as the module is loaded.
member.remarks: This is made possible thanks to Fody.

member.summary: Initializes the module.

member.name: T:Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json.ICustomJsonSerializable
member.summary: Allows a type to implement their own (de)serialization mechanism.

member.name: M:Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json.ICustomJsonSerializable.Serialize(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonWriter)
member.summary: Serializes the object to the specified json writer.

member.name: M:Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json.ICustomJsonSerializable.Deserialize(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader)
member.summary:
Serializes the object from the specified json reader.
Note that the object is always constructed by the serialization engine, the object itself must read the values from the .

member.name: T:Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonSerializationConfiguration
member.summary: Serialization configuration with additional json configuration.

member.name: P:Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonSerializationConfiguration.UseBson
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the use bson instead of json.
member.value: true if bson should be used instead of json; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the json formatting.

member.name: P:Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonSerializationConfiguration.IsEnumSerializedWithString
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to serialize Enum as string instead of int.
member.value: true if Enum is serialized as string; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json.IJsonSerializer
member.summary: Interface for the binary serializer.

member.name: P:Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json.IJsonSerializer.PreserveReferences
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether references should be preserved.
This will add additional $graphid and $graphrefid properties to each json object.
member.value: true if references should be preserved; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json.IJsonSerializer.WriteTypeInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether type information should be written to the json output.
member.value: true if type info should be written; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonSerializer.ShouldExternalSerializerHandleMember(System.Type)
member.summary:
Returns whether json.net should handle the member.
By default it only handles non-class types.
member.returns: true if json.net should handle the type, false otherwise.
